fields.name: Dataset
fields.description: The name of the Power BI dataset. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: GroupId
fields.description: The ID of the Power BI group.

fields.name: GroupName
fields.description: The name of the Power BI group. Use this property to help remember which specific Power BI group id was used.

fields.name: RefreshToken
fields.description: A refresh token that can be used to obtain a valid access token that can then be used to authenticate with the data source. A valid refresh token is currently only obtainable via the Azure Portal. It is recommended to put a dummy string value here when creating the data source and then going to the Azure Portal to authenticate the data source which will update this property with a valid refresh token. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: Table
fields.description: The name of the Power BI table under the specified dataset. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: TokenUserDisplayName
fields.description: The user display name of the user that was used to obtain the refresh token. Use this property to help remember which user was used to obtain the refresh token.

fields.name: TokenUserPrincipalName
fields.description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user that was used to obtain the refresh token. Use this property to help remember which user was used to obtain the refresh token.
